Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of PRCM module mode.

Function Documentation

static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsModuleClkActivityValid ( pmhalPrcmModuleId_t  moduleId)
static

This API verifies if the Module ClkActivity is valid or not.

Parameters
moduleIdUnique ID of the module to be enabled
idxModule mode index
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the module is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid module id
static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsModuleClkCtrlOffsetValid ( pmhalPrcmModuleId_t  moduleId)
static

This API verifies if the Module ClkCtrlOffset is valid or not.

Parameters
moduleIdUnique ID of the module to be enabled
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the module is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid module id
static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsModuleModeValid ( pmhalPrcmModuleId_t  moduleId,
pmhalPrcmModuleSModuleMode_t  modMode 
)
static

This API verifies if the Module is valid or not.

Parameters
moduleIdUnique ID of the module to be enabled
modModeModule mode which is to be set
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the module is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid module id

static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsSIdleModeSupported ( pmhalPrcmSysConfigModuleId_t  sysConfElemId,
pmhalPrcmModuleSIdleMode_t  sIdleMode 
)
static

This API verifies if the Idle Mode is supported by module.

Parameters
sysConfElemIdSysConfig element Id
sIdleStateIdleState of module. Refer enum pmhalPrcmModuleSIdleState_t for values
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the module is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid module id
static pmErrCode_t PmhalIsStandbyModeSupported ( pmhalPrcmSysConfigModuleId_t  sysConfElemId,
pmhalPrcmModuleMStbyMode_t  stbyMode 
)
static

This API verifies if the standBy mode is supported by module.

Parameters
sysConfElemIdSysConfig element Id
stbyModeStandByState of module. Refer enum pmhalPrcmModuleMStbyMode_t for values
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following, PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_FAIL Indicates the module is not enabled (timeout) PM_BADARGS Invalid module id

static void PmhalModuleSIdleStatusGetInternal ( pmhalPrcmModuleId_t  modId,
pmhalPrcmModuleSIdleState_t *  sIdleState 
)
static

This API gets the sIdle state of the given module.

Parameters
modIdUnique ID of the module ( GET_MOD_ID is taken care)
sIdleStateIdleState of module. Refer enum pmhalPrcmModuleSIdleState_t for values
Return values
None
